column6: SANDBLASTED PART 2 Spider-Man finds himself faced with a bizarre ally: The Sandman, seeking Spider-Man's aid in saving an innocent man on death row. A man who is accused of the recent killing of Uncle Ben?!
column8: | inker:Rob Campanella | writer:Peter David | penciller:Todd Nauck | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
